it.polimi.se2018.model.viewmodel

Class ViewDataOrganizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.viewmodel.ViewDataOrganizer

  • public class ViewDataOrganizer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to store all information sent by the server to the view.

        public void push(ModelUpdate update)
        Pushes a generic ModelUpdate message.

        The push is achieved through a visitor pattern.

        Parameters:
        update - the message to push.
